shinyREDCap 0.0.2.9000
  • Reference

Reference

Package Information

shinyREDCap

shinyREDCap: Access REDCap Instruments through R Shiny

Start Using shinyREDCap

Execute this function to launch shinyREDCap.

run_app()

Run the Shiny Application

Module UI Functions

Add these functions to the UI portion of your Shiny Application with the appropriate namespace.

redcap_setup_ui()

REDCap Setup UI

redcap_instrument_ui()

REDCap Instrument UI

Module Server Function

Add the server function to the server portion of your Shiny Application with the appropriate namespace.

redcap_server()

REDCap Server

Supported REDCap Questions/Values

redcap_shinywidget_map

REDCap Widget Map

redcap_survey_complete

REDCap Survey Complete
